skills.skill: Modeling tools, including automated testing tools framework
Industry standard automation test tools (Selenium, Protractor, Cucumber)
Database (Sybase, DB2 UDB, SQL Server, Oracle etc), SQL, UNIX Shell Scripting

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership, direction, and guidance to a focused workgroup in driving execution of testing frameworks across various projects.
Champion quality assurance that improves test delivery processes and be a role model and mentor to the junior and midlevel testers.
Provide hands-on test automation support in writing, maintaining and improving test code with best coding practices followed.
Translate broad strategies into specific action plans, using existing resources and information to achieve strategic objectives and improve business results.
Work closely with test teams, developers, business and vendor partners to drive and promote technical design in all engineering processes.
Lead technical transformation within the team moving from a manual testing approach to an automation approach.
Drive the team to become more adaptable in quality assurance through test automation, and Continuous Testing practices.

education_certification.credential: BS in Computer Science or Information Technology, or related field or equivalent combination of education and experience from which knowledge and skills may be obtained.
